channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: CDC cuts the number of recommended vaccines for children, effective immediately
item.description: The U.S. took the unprecedented step Monday of cutting the number of vaccines it recommends for every child — a move that leading medical groups said ...

item.title: What Actually Separates an A+ Startup Team From a B Team
item.description: Three capabilities to upskill your new and growing company

item.title: Air traffic still runs on floppy discs in places, so the FAA just picked 2 companies for a $26 billion radar overhaul
item.description: The FAA has been spending most of its $3 billion equipment budget just maintaining the fragile old system.

item.title: I Refused a Partnership Offer at a Major Firm
item.description: Instead, I doubled down on building my own.

item.title: Pizza plummeted on the list of Americans’ favorite take-out options as they opt for more nutrient-dense slop bowls from Uber Eats
item.description: Even when customers choose pizza, they tend to get smaller pies and fewer toppings, said Papa John’s executives.

item.title: The Most Revealing Thing About Nvidia’s New Chip Comes Down to the Name
item.description: Why Nvidia’s decision to call its next-generation platform “Rubin” says more about its ambitions than any benchmark slide.

item.title: Why Founders Should Play a Full-Contact Sport
item.description: Hockey taught me how to stay calm under pressure and lead when the game gets messy.

item.title: Meet an Oregon cafe where American Sign Language is the default way to order
item.description: The cafe — owned by CymaSpace, a nonprofit that makes art accessible to the Deaf community — also hosts weekly ASL meetups and game nights.

item.title: XRP price is on the rise today as crypto markets show early signs of a rebound: Here are 2 reasons why

item.title: 3 big changes in retirement planning you should know about for 2026
item.description: For retirement savers and retirees, the new year brings more than the usual inflation adjustments to retirement contributions . The retirement legisla...

item.title: LEGO Just Announced Its Biggest Innovation Since the Minifig
item.description: The company showed up at CES to introduce its new high-tech brick.

item.title: Trump’s Ukraine peace plan endangered by his launch of a new war in the western hemisphere, saber rattling over Greeland
item.description: Leaders of Ukraine’s allies gathered Tuesday in Paris for key talks that could help determine the country’s security after any potential peace deal.

item.title: Quantum computing momentum grows: D-Wave announces first major breakthrough of 2026

item.title: GameStop store closures: List of doomed locations grows in 2026 as the retailer races to reduce costs
item.description: GameStop Corp. is forging ahead with efforts to reduce its physical footprint in the first weeks of 2026. The video game retailer is closing stores in...

item.title: Trump Mobile has been accepting $100 deposits for a golden phone but the prototype is nowhere to be seen as CES kicks off
item.description: Trump Mobile initially hailed T1 as a device that would be “proudly designed and built in the United States for customers who expect the best."
